title: Accessories
content:
You can search by Name, Rarity, or Effect. Just type into the search box what you are looking for.

Quick Search of All Amulets

Name Rarity Effect Aberration Hunters' Amulet Uncommon Aberration Hunter: A githyanki wearing this amulet has advantage on Intelligence Saving Throws. Aberrations also have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls against them.
